CARTINTS brand edge trimming squeegee will help you complete vinyl film wrapping in narrow corners.4 Inches Felt Edge Squeegee: ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:37:59 UTC – Details)



7 in1 Edge Trimming Squeegee: The squeegee set has 14 ends with different shapes, which fit for any edge of your car, such as headlight, Bumper, car doors handle, Car center-console. CARTINTS brand edge trimming squeegee will help you complete vinyl film wrapping in narrow corners.
4 Inches Felt Edge Squeegee: Made of soft plastic, strong enough to improve the efficiency of smoothing vinyl film. Microfiber felt edge squeegee will not leave any scratches or marks on the thin self-adhesive paper.
Vinyl Wrap Cutter And 9mm Knife Blade: The razor cutter is safe enough for you to cut off vinyl film roll because its blade is hidden inside. The retractable 9 mm knife is the best to trim the excess vinyl film or cut the size you want. Snap off blade will miantain long time best cutting performance.
Vinyl Wrap Magnets and Work Gloves: You can use the vinyl magnet tool to hold the large vinyl film paper so that you can free your hands to finish the details from smoothing to trimming.Work gloves is the key tool to prevent hands injury, or the damages of vinyl wrap paper.
Package: 7 x blue hard edge-trimming squeegee, 2x blue felt squeegee, 2 x vinyl wrap magnet holder,1 x 9mm utility knife,10 x blades,5 x squeegee felts replacement,1 x safe red cutter, 1x black work gloves

Transparent Sunshades

Transparent window shades are lighter shades, ideal for the front side window of a vehicle, where visibility is more important. It can also be used on any glass surface from your kitchen window to the school bus.

When not in use Twist to Fold into a small circle and fit in the provided storage bag for easy storage inside any handbag, car organiser, sun visor strap or door pocket.

How to fold: 1. Put all the pieces that are to be folded together on top of each other. 2. Hold the shades on both sides. 3. Bring your hands towards each other with a twist. 4. The lightweight wire will fold itself into a small circle. 5. Store in the provided storage pouch.

Play the video for more.

What’s special about this sunshade?

It’s made of 120 GSM mesh (versus commonly used 80 GSM), paired with 15s static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s), offering superior quality & higher density, providing better sun/UV protection. It also comes in 2 transparency options.

How can I install and uninstall this?

Wipe the window clean, throw this bad boy over the glass and give it a gentle swipe. For folding, please see video for visual explanation.

Can I open the window with this sunshade on?

No. The shades attach to the glass so they need to be removed before operating the car window.

Mine arrived with some wrinkles. Is it normal?

Yes. This is due to the nature of the plastic film and happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

What is included in the package?

This set includes 2 transparent shades, 2 semi-transparent shades & a free storage pouch. Please keep in mind they are packed back to back to protect the film from damage during shipping & may appear as 2 pieces rather sets. Pull them apart gently.

Product Description

4 Pack of Homyhoo Potato Grow Bags

Fabric grow bags are much better at controlling the temperature and water content of your growing medium than traditional plastic pots. In the cold, the fabric will keep your plant warmer, and in the hot sun your plant will be kept cooler, so it doesnâ€™t overheat. (ps: fabric bags may need more frequent watering, itâ€™s because of the porous material which is less likely to hold in excess water as the old plastic pot materials do.)

Planting Tips

1. Moisten the soil and compost mix thoroughly. Fill about 1/3 full (6″-8″ deep) with a 50/50 mixture of garden soil and compost.

2. Evenly space 3 to 5 seed potatoes and/or pieces (“eyes up” ) and cover with 3 inches of soil.

3. As the potatoes continue growing, continue adding soil/compost mix until you reach the top of the grow bag.

4. Water regularly. During hot and dry summer days, potato plants should be watered once every 2 to 3 days. During cooler days with rainfall, potatoes may not need watering at all.

5. Look for signs when the leaves start yellowing and the stems wilt. Then stop watering and wait a week or two. Potatoes are ready for harvesting when more than 50% of the leaves have turned yellow.

Air Pruning Function

Fabric grow bags help to alleviate the issue because as the roots meet the edges of the fabric pot, they sense the drier soil that is exposed to the air. At this point, they know they have reached their growth limit. The roots become â€œair prunedâ€ which is vital to growing healthy plants in containers. You will also get many more fibrous roots when air pruned. A more fibrous root system (many small root tips) allows the plants to take in more nutrients and water.

Premium Material: Made of breathable double layer non-woven fabric, material is heavy duty felt, the bag ensures good ventilation to prevent excessive moisture, also provide more oxygen for your plants. The strong and biodegradable material can prolong the service life of the bags, at the same time cause no pollution.
Convenient Design: These grow bag comes with large harvest window, through which you can check your plant and easily harvest veggies. These grow bags are made of sturdy material to ensure you may move around the bags filled with soil.
Large Capacity: These vegetable grow bags with large capacity of 10 gallons allow to grow veggies as much as you want. Thanks to the large size, it will create a stable growing environment for veggies and flowers.
Easy to Move: The strong handles make them easy to move around as your needs. These potato grow bags are perfect to use at patios, gardens, balconies, sunrooms and any indoor/outdoor space. They can be used to grow potato, onions, taro, radish, carrots and other vegetables.
Easy to Store and Reuse: The bags can be easily fold up and wonâ€™t take up much space when storing. Easily move and flap the lid to harvest potatoes without much effort. Please put about 4 to 6 seeds in each bag. At the end of the growing season, you may empty the bags, simply clean them and store dry.

The 18S Static cling can come in handy for increased suction endurance when compared to the conventional 15S cling which is used by others.

  • Dual-Layer Design: Our window shade features an excellent, dual-layer design that gives the best of both material usage, the 18S Film and 80&120 GSM Mesh.

Product Description

Why Choose KUSUFE Plastic Razor Blade Scraper?

Are you still annoying about the difficult removal of labels, decals, stickers, glue, paint, adhesive, food residue, etc.?

Are you still using your fragile nails to remove the above stains?

If so, then it is time for you to take KUSUFEFI Plastic Scrapers around your house, and you will find that your cleaning has never been so easy.

Warm Tips:

1. When you replace the blade, please note that the tips on both sides of the blade are somewhat sharp.

2. Since the plastic blade is double-sided, when one side becomes blunt, you can use the other side to continue using.

3. For some particularly stubborn stains, we recommend to use the remover and plastic scraper together to achieve the best cleaning effect.

What Will You Get?

Including 2pcs scrapers and 60pcs extra plastic double edged blades, helps you save more money.

MAKE YOU CLEAN COMFORTABLY: Our plastic blade scraper adopts an ergonomic curved handle design. The dent on the handle is specially designed for your thumb to be placed on it while working, providing you with comfortable control and saving your time and energy
SAFE CLEANING SCRAPER TOOL: Two slots on the back of the blade scraper securely hold the plastic razor blades to ensure that the blade will not slip out. The plastic blade is sharp but safe, you won’t worry about this scraper multitool cutting your fingers while working
SCRATCH FREE SCRAPER TOOL: Our plastic scraper consists of a sturdy ABS handle and plastic blade. It removes stubborn stains more easily, but it won’t scratch the surfaces like metal blades. You can use it on paint, glass, metal, wood, plastic, and tile surfaces safely
MULTI-PURPOSE CLEANING SCRAPER: This sticker scraper tool is ideal for removing decals, stickers, tints, labels from windows, cars, RV, walls, tiles, floors, paint, wood, and glass. It can also remove food residues from oven, cooktop, and glass stove top
HANGING DESIGN FOR EASIER STORAGE: This plastic razor scraper tool is lightweight and portable pocket-sized, making it very easy to carry and store. What are you still hesitating? Just to equip your kitchen, garage, RV, tool bag with such an interesting scraper tool

Product Description

The Ideal Windshield Cleaning Toolï¼š

Our car window cleaner come with two different panels for you to use. Through simple replacement, you can easily use them to clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks. Keep your car windshield cleaning for perfect visibility.

Application of Auto Windshield Cleaning Tool :

1. Car windshield cleaner tool are great works as a fog & moisture removal tool.

2. Windshield cleaner tool /car window cleaner tool is also an ideal tool for home cleaning.

3. The car windshield cleaner is great for clean car windows inside and outside, and good for all size cars, RVs, SUV and trucks

4. You can also used for cleaning house, include windows, television, monitor, kitchen walls, bathrooms mirrors, even tables and floors at home.

Windshield Inside Cleaning Tool Specifications:

Material: Aluminum Alloy / Plastic ( ABS ), Microfiber

Brush Length: 63.98cm / 25.19 inch

Brush Head: 15 x 10cm / 5.9 x 3.9 inch

Triangular Brush Head: 13 x 14.5cm / 5.1 x 5.7 inch

Maximum Flip Angle: 180Â°

Covers Head Color: Yellow, Grey, Blue

Reusable Microfiber Padsï¼š

Car windshield cleaner tool come come with 4pcs washable & reusable cloth (2x yellow+1x grey+1x blue), they are made of microfiber fine fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective, and never cause streaking after cleaning.

Car Windshield Cleaner Tool Install Instruction:

1. Hold the ergonomic non-slip part with one hand(Note: Don’t wear the ergonomic side upside, it should be downside install).

2. Hold the bottom of windshield cleaner with one hand and hold the top of the handle with the other hand, turn left the long handle to extend the handle.

3. Hold the middle black part and hold the handle with the other hand and than turn right to tightened it.

4. Use two finger to hold the cylindrical button, slowly push in to install the handle.

Car Windshield Cleaner Tool Package Includes:

1 X Extendable Handle

1X Detachable Rectangle Panel

1X Detachable Triangle Panel

4 X Microfiber Cloth (2pcs Yellow+1pcs Grey+1pcs Blue)

1 X Empty Bottle
